about_the_game:
A mixture of visual novel, horror and escape room. Explore the strange apartment to discover its secrets in a meditative narrative dark adventure. Dark realistic 3D graphics, atmospheric immersive puzzles, and a chilling, gripping storyline about the struggle for your life and more await you.
.
...this song will never get out of my head
intrusive, crowds out every single thought
repetitive to the point of nausea
Is this still a dream or not?
What time did I get home...
if ever returned
Damn I don't remember anything
Why is it so cold?
The pain is coming. Is she in the head? Or shoulder...
Oooh
This is no longer a dream
WHERE I AM
my head hurts, I see double, I'm naked and...
covered in blood...

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of violence, corpses and dismemberment. There is also profanity.

name: 5.5 ROOMS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 @ 2.4 GHz, AMD FX 8120 @ 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 630 / 650m, AMD Radeon HD6570 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel i7 920 @ 2.7 GHz, AMD Phenom II 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660, Radeon R9-270
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

short_description: Yesterday you were at a graduation party, and today you find yourself half-naked in blood, handcuffed to the radiator. Find out what happened and try to figure out what to do with it next. Explore the strange apartment to discover its secrets in a meditative narrative dark adventure.
